law.catch_line: If, in good faith and with reasonable grounds, the Comptroller or a peace officer of the State seize...
law.text: If, in good faith and with reasonable grounds, the Comptroller or a peace officer of the State seizes contraband property or a conveyance used to transport contraband property under § 13-835 of this article, the Comptroller or peace officer shall have the immunity from liability described under § 5-523 of the Courts and Judicial Proceedings Article.
